Message.Title: eBay TOTAL RIPOFF...
Message.Msg: Unless you are an ebay seller who gets his merchandise for resale absolutely free or as in some cases, stolen - you are not making any money. Case in point using ebay then paypal to complete transaction for two item I recently sold: Seiko Automatic Diver's Watch Paypal Transaction: Total $184.50 Net: $178.95 Fee: $5.65 (.030623) is percentage charged Ebay Auction: Item sold for $172.50 eBay Fees: 19.50 (.113...) is percentage charged Total Net from Sale: $159.35 Dell Inspiron: Paypal Transaction: Total $450.00 Net: $436.22 Fee: $13.78 eBay Auction: $450.00 eBay Fees: $50.85 Fee: $50.85 Total Net: $385.37
